data.note: The national utility PLN is the only off-taker for on-grid projects. PLN is heavily subsidised by the state and operates at a loss, which is why it has stopped signing power purchase agreements with IPPs aiming to build projects in non-remote areas. With the on-going restructuring of the utility and the spin-off of its renewables arm, the company is considered high risk.
data.name: Power offtake risk for independent generators
